Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    true,
    IsBlank(MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && MensSize.Selected.Result && MensColour.Selected.Colour && MensBrand.Selected.Brands && Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Value(MensPriceMax.Text)),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        Gender = "Mens"
    ),
    !IsBlank(MensProductType.SearchText) && IsBlank(MensSize.Selected.Result && MensColour.Selected.Colour && Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Value(MensPriceMax.Text) && MensBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type'
    ),
    !IsBlank(MensProductType.SearchText && MensSize.Selected.Result) && IsBlank(MensColour.Selected.Colour && Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Value(MensPriceMax.Text) && MensBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = MensProductType.Selected.Size
    ),
    !IsBlank(MensProductType.SearchText && MensSize.Selected.Result && MensColour.Selected.Colour) && IsBlank(Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Value(MensPriceMax.Text) && MensBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = MensProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = MensColour.Selected.Colour
    ),
    !IsBlank(MensProductType.SearchText && MensSize.Selected.Result && MensColour.Selected.Colour && Value(MensPriceMin.Text)) && IsBlank(Value(MensPriceMax.Text) && MensBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = MensProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = MensColour.Selected.Colour && Price >= Value(MensPriceMin.Text)
    ),
    !IsBlank(MensProductType.SearchText && MensSize.Selected.Result && MensColour.Selected.Colour && Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Value(MensPriceMax.Text)) && IsBlank(MensBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = MensProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = MensColour.Selected.Colour && Price >= Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Price <= Value(MensPriceMax.Text)
    ),
    !IsBlank(MensProductType.SearchText && MensSize.Selected.Result && MensColour.Selected.Colour && Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Value(MensPriceMax.Text) && MensBrand.Selected.Brands),
    Filter(
        OurProducts,
        'Product Type' = MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type' && Size = MensProductType.Selected.Size && Colour = MensColour.Selected.Colour && Price >= Value(MensPriceMin.Text) && Price <= Value(MensPriceMax.Text) && Brands = MensBrand.Selected.Brands
    )
)

"SELECT * FROM OurProducts" & " WHERE " & "Product Type = [" & Text(MensProductType.Selected.'Product Type') & "], " & "Size = [" & Text(MensSize.Selected.Result) & "], " & "Colour = [" & Text(MensColour.Selected.Colour) & "], " & "Price = [>" & Text(MensPriceMin) & "] " & " [<" & Text(MensPriceMax) & "], " & "Brand = [" & Text(MensBrand.Selected.Brands) & "]"
